title: What an Owl Knows: The New Science of the World’s Most Enigmatic Birds
content: What an Owl Knows: The New Science of the World’s Most Enigmatic Birds by AckermanJennifer. 2023. Penguin Random House, LLC, New York, NY, USA. pp. $30.00 (hardcover) ISBN 978-0593298886. $15.99 (ebook) ISBN 978-0593298893.
